and date(now())>item.plan_time and item.is_submit=0 and item.is_submit=1 and item.submit_time>item.plan_time and #{dtStart}<=item.plan_time and #{dtEnd}>=item.plan_time and #{checkTagCount}=(select count(*) from tb_plan_check ch where ch.check_tag in
#{item1} and item_id=item.pkid and `status`=1) and #{noCheckTagCount}=(select count(*) from tb_plan_check ch where ch.check_tag in

and item_id=item.pkid and `status`=0) order by item.pkid desc

select s.`name` as stageName,s.poit,d.`name` as docName,d.is_output as isOutput,d.output from tb_plan_template t left join tb_plan_template_item i on t.pkid = i.temp_id left join twf_stage s on s.pkid= i.stage_id left join twf_stage_doc d on d.pkid = i.stage_doc_id where t.pro_code=#{proCode} and t.type=#{type}
select * from tb_plan_item where plan_id = #{planId} and detail_id = #{detailId}
